name: SNONG (Magic Magpie Games)
description:
Prompt nine for my game a week course was 'weird input'! So a friend and I made SNONG! It's two players and needs a keyboard to play, so find a friend and face off!

Find my co-creator's amazing games here: https://potatobackflip.itch.io/

and his twitter here: https://twitter.com/potatobackflip
